alert.note: Alert for Eastern Mogollon Rim; Oak Creek and Sycamore Canyons; Yavapai County Mountains; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 5:38PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT THE VERDE VALLEY THROUGH 615 PM MST... At 536 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles southwest of Stoneman Lake to 6 miles south of Camp Verde to 13 miles northwest of Horseshoe Reservoir. Movement was west at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. Wind gusts of 45 mph have been reported in Pine. SOURCE...Automated stations and radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Camp Verde, Sedona, Prescott Valley, Clarkdale, Dewey-humboldt, Verde Village, Mcguireville, Cherry, Village At Oak Creek, Montezuma Castle National Monument, Poland Junction, Cordes, Bridgeport, Montezuma Well, Mayer, Middle Verde, Cordes Junction, Bumble Bee, Cordes Lakes, and Page Springs. This includes the following highways... Interstate 17 between mile markers 250 and 308. State Route 260 between mile markers 207 and 236. State Route 179 between mile markers 299 and 312. State Route 89A between mile markers 329 and 372. State Route 69 between mile markers 263 and 286. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until these storms pass.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Mogollon Rim; Oak Creek and Sycamore Canyons; Yavapai County Mountains; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins
